sentences.en: A greater current will overheat and seriously damage the generator having the smaller capacity.
sentences.cn: (后置定语)电流大,就能使载流量较小的发电机过热并受到严重损坏.

sentences.en: Boys can't overheat. i need an alarm to remind me to go to the bathroom.
sentences.cn: 我需要用手表闹铃来提醒我什么时候去洗手间, 你知道这是多么羞辱的事情吗?

sentences.en: Do not overheat cylinder to increase pressure or discharge rate.
sentences.cn: 禁止使钢瓶过热来增加压力或流速.

sentences.en: Fill your radiator with water, or your engine will overheat.
sentences.cn: 给你的散热器充水, 否则引擎会过热.

sentences.en: I think the engine’s overheating again.
Of estate overheat alarm dispatch is ceaseless, ought to make early answer, not pluvial silken tassel.
sentences.cn: 房地产过热的警讯不断, 应当早作应对, 未雨绸缨.

sentences.en: Several protective devices adopted : alarm for open circuit of thermocouple, alarm for overheat and overloading protect.
sentences.cn: 设有热电偶断偶报警 、 高温报警、过载保护多种安全保护.

sentences.en: System forced into a lower frequency ( usually because of CPU overheat. )
sentences.cn: 系统正处于低频率运作中 ( 通常是因为cpu过热 )

sentences.en: Test results have provoked worries that the reactor could overheat.
sentences.cn: 试验的结果引起了人们对反应堆过热的担忧.

sentences.en: The car developed a tendence to overheat.
sentences.cn: 这轿车有变得过热的倾向.

sentences.en: The measure of a few administration adopted in these overheat industries, also be effective.
sentences.cn: 在这些过热行业中采用了一些行政的措施, 也是有效的.

sentences.en: The primary inverter driving circuit circuit , protection circuits for overheat low voltage circuit are introduced specially.
sentences.cn: 重点介绍了一次逆变的驱动电路及过流、过热、过压保护电路.

sentences.en: The unique washing heater overheat protection device.
sentences.cn: 独有的漂洗加热器过热保护装置.

sentences.en: Their prime consideration has been not to overheat the economy.
sentences.cn: 他们首要考虑的是防止经济发展过快。

sentences.en: Try not to overheat the sauce.
sentences.cn: 注意别把调味汁热过头了。

sentences.en: Why do we pay to overheat pubs and hotels?
sentences.cn: 为什么我们要为酒吧和宾馆不必要的暖气开支买单呢？

trans.tran_en: to become too hot, or to make something too hot

trans.tran_cn: 过度加热，使愤怒，（使）过分激动，（使）变得过热
